body:
## Release Notes

## Features

- Add Freedesktop portal screenshot support. @iphydf (#457)
- Allow user to control chat log chunk size. @iphydf (#447)
- Show update available in nightly builds. @iphydf (#452)
- Add a "copy peer ID" context menu action in conferences. @iphydf (#441)
- Add stack trace logging on crash. @iphydf (#442)

## Bug Fixes

- Use notification categories on Linux @Pigpog (#427)
- Improve "copy link to clipboard" on Linux. @iphydf (#440)

## Documentation

- Translations update from Hosted Weblate @weblate (#444)
- Translations update from Hosted Weblate @weblate (#438)

## Maintenance (Grunt tasks)

- Add issue type to the issue templates. @iphydf (#465)
- Add emojis to the issue templates. @iphydf (#464)
- Move toktok-stack test to circleci. @iphydf (#456)
- Add a macos-10.15 build. @iphydf (#451)
- Fix releaser to properly wait for builds. @iphydf (#435)

## Maintenance (Code cleanup)

- Enable most clang-tidy readability checks. @iphydf (#467)
- Remove some redundant includes. @iphydf (#468)
- Group `#include`s with clang-format. @iphydf (#411)
- Simplify boolean returns. @iphydf (#84)
- Mark some more variables as `const`. @iphydf (#466)
- Use raw strings to simplify regexes. @iphydf (#88)
- Remove useless translation. @iphydf (#454)
- Avoid implicit bool conversions. @iphydf (#77)
- Use braces initialiser for io_service_t. @iphydf (#450)
- Add support for macOS before 12.0. @iphydf (#448)
- Avoid multiple declarations per statement. @iphydf (#85)
- Add `const` to local variables where possible. @iphydf (#74)
- Don't move trivially copyable values. @iphydf (#79)
- Make member functions `const` where possible. @iphydf (#83)
- Use explicit constructors where possible. @iphydf (#439)
- Pass moved-from objects by value instead of const ref. @iphydf (#80)

## Maintenance (Tests)

- Run tests against all commits in a PR. @iphydf (#459)
- Get better error messages in notification test. @iphydf (#446)
name: v1.18.3
